title: Sample, ca. 1953
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber
Technique: plain weave
inscribed: #5054 c.1953  Property of Dorothy Liebes Studio
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19.1 x 19.4 cm (7 1/2 x 7 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
Plain weave with alternate warps tripled. 
Warp: bouclé and 2 ply smooth yarn.
Weft: chenille or bouclé yarns alternate with metallic yarns of varying widths and types; some flat, some braided, some wrapped and some paired.
